questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Pets and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A dog playing outside
B) A dog sitting in the sun light
C) A dog eating food
D) A dog running in a field

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The background
B) The dog
C) The window
D) The floor

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A plant
B) A person
C) A dog
D) A toy

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Trees and bushes
B) A beach scene
C) A wooden deck
D) A busy street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bowl of food
B) A dog lying on the floor
C) A pile of toys
D) A pair of shoes

What is the dog doing in the photo?
A) Running
B) Sleeping
C) Sitting and looking ahead
D) Eating

What can be seen through the window?
A) A garden
B) A wooden deck
C) A playground
D) A street

What type of flooring is in the photo?
A) Carpet
B) Hardwood
C) Tile
D) Concrete

How is the dog positioned in relation to the window?
A) Facing away from the window
B) Sitting in front of the window or door
C) Lying to the side of the window
D) Standing near the window

What is the dog's expression?
A) Happy and playful
B) Sad and droopy
C) Calm and relaxed
D) Angry and aggressive

What texture is the dog's fur?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Curly and frizzy
C) Rough and wiry
D) Soft and fluffy

What is the color of the wooden deck outside the window?
A) Light brown
B) Dark brown
C) Grey
D) White

What is the dog's fur color?
A) Black and white
B) Brown and black
C) Grey and white
D) Golden and brown

How many legs of the dog are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the shape of the shadow on the floor?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Irregular

What is the material of the window frame?
A) Wood and glass
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Glass

What is the dog's posture?
A) Standing upright
B) Lying down
C) Sitting upright
D) Curled up

What is the dog's tag shape?
A) Heart
B) Circle
C) Square
D) Star

How is the dog's fur around its face?
A) Short and trimmed
B) Long and shaggy
C) Curly and tight
D) Smooth and sleek

What is the position of the dog's ears?
A) Pointed up
B) Drooping down
C) Folded back
D) Standing straight

What can be seen on the wooden deck outside?
A) A table
B) A chair
C) A shadow
D) A plant

What is the dog's overall demeanor?
A) Energetic
B) Relaxed
C) Nervous
D) Aggressive

What is the primary color of the room's walls?
A) White
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

How does the light affect the dog's fur?
A) Makes it look shiny
B) Makes it look dull
C) Creates shadows
D) Adds no effect

What can be inferred about the dog's environment?
A) It's an outdoor setting
B) It's a cozy indoor space
C) It's a noisy area
D) It's a crowded place

Which part of the dog is most illuminated by the sunlight?
A) The back
B) The face
C) The paws
D) The tail

What is the texture of the floor?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and uneven
C) Carpeted and soft
D) Tiled and cool

What is the shape of the dog's nose?
A) Round
B) Square
C) Irregular
D) Oval

How is the dog's tail positioned?
A) Curled up
B) Straight out
C) Tucked under
D) Wagging

What is the dog's eye color?
A) Blue
B) Brown
C) Green
D) Not visible

What is the dog's breed?
A) Unknown
B) Labrador
C) Poodle
D) Terrier mix

How does the sunlight affect the room's ambiance?
A) Makes it warm and inviting
B) Makes it cold and unwelcoming
C) Makes it dark and moody
D) Makes it bright and harsh

What is the dog wearing around its neck?
A) A scarf
B) A collar with a tag
C) A bowtie
D) A harness

What is the dog's fur length?
A) Short
B) Medium
C) Long
D) Very long

What is the dog's body language?
A) Relaxed and comfortable

C) Playful and energetic
D) Scared and anxious
